channel.title: Arixium - Looking for Developers
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/4hxwxx.png[/img]
[B]*Please not: This is not a paid job, but please know that when donations come in they will all be split evenly, according to effort and work done.*
Hello,
The team at Arixium are developing a creative, interesting, unique server. We are searching for a Development Team to help us in perfecting the Server and to join in on the
opportunity of a lifetime. We are looking for mature, hard working, dedicated members to join us. We will be using a base i have obtained, and have already invested in a vps,
domain, webhost, and website. We will be working on a 317 loading 634+ and we hope you will take us into consideration for we will not let you down.
Positions Open:
Server Developer - You will be responsible for all Server coding.
Client Developer - You will be responsible for all Client coding
Web Developer - You will be responsible for working on the forums, and working to make it look presentable.
Current Positions:
Server Developer - Open Financial Adviser/Developer - CEO Ryan Client Developer - Open Web Developer - Open Graphics Designer - Sauer
Form Application:
Position: Age: Timezone: Years of Experience: Other Information: Access to Skype (If so, username):

item.title: Arixium - Looking for Developers
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

Position: Web developer
Age: 18
Timezone: GMT +1
Years of Experience: ~2 years
Other Information: I’m professional, mature and can handle alot of situations. Also I’ve been using photoshop for around 3 years so I know my way around Photoshop to make prettty much anything.
Access to Skype (If so, username): exaample

Read full topic

[B]Please not: This is not a paid job, but please know that when donations come in they will all be split evenly, according to effort and work done.

Hello,

The team at Arixium are developing a creative, interesting, unique server. We are searching for a Development Team to help us in perfecting the Server and to join in on the
